controllers

Class SearchController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.SearchController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LogoutEvent

    public class SearchController
extends java.lang.Object
implements LogoutEvent
    This class controls the search functionality represented by search.fxml. Allows the user to search through all photos in the user's account by date or by tag. Implements LogoutEvent.
    Author:
    Derek Schatel

        Transitions to a Photo View of the selected photo.
        Parameters:
        mainstage - the main stage

      • handleSearch

        private void handleSearch()
        Starts a search given the specified parameters. Checks the start/end date ranges specified by the DatePicker and pulls all photos associated with those dates as well as any specified tags in the tag list.

      • checkSearchDate

        private boolean checkSearchDate(java.time.LocalDate start,
                                java.time.LocalDate end,
                                Photo p)
        Helper function to check whether a photo is within the date ranges specified by the DatePickers.
        Parameters:
        start - the start date
        end - the end date
        p - the photo being checked
        Returns:
        whether the photo is within the date range

      • checkTags

        private boolean checkTags(java.util.List<Tags> searchedTags,
                          java.util.List<Tags> photoTags)
        Checks whether a photo contains one of the tags specified in the tag list
        Parameters:
        searchedTags - the list of tags to be searched for
        photoTags - the list of that specific photo's tags
        Returns:
        whether the photo's tags contains one of the tags being searched for

      • deleteTags

        private void deleteTags()
